keyword: how many calories in small carrots
title: How Many Calories in Small Carrots?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in small carrots, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per carrot with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in Small Carrots?
assumptions: Raw, whole small carrots (~50 g each), unpeeled, fresh; standard variety like Nantes or Imperator.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, size, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels for packaged carrots when available.

quick_answer.text: One small raw carrot provides ~20 kcal, mostly from carbs with good fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one small carrot?
faqs.a: About 20 kcal for a raw small carrot weighing ~50 g.
Yes, ~4.8 g carbs per small carrot, with 1.4 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in small carrots?
faqs.a: Around 1.4 g dietary fiber per small carrot, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do small carrots have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.5 g protein and 0.1 g fat per small carrot.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in small carrots?
faqs.a: Boiling or steaming slightly reduces calories to ~18 kcal due to water loss; frying adds more.
